meta.title: Maritime Electronics Services | Installation, Repair & Maintenance
meta.description: We provide professional maritime electronics services, including GMDSS, navigation, connectivity, and automation, ensuring reliable performance at sea.

hero.subtitle: Excellence in maritime services since inception
hero.description: We are committed to providing world-class maritime solutions with a focus on safety, reliability, and innovation.

qualityOfService.title: Quality of Service
qualityOfService.desc1: Wheelhouse not only delivers high-quality services but also accompanies clients comprehensively throughout their entire journey. Our experienced engineers proactively identify and strive to resolve issues before they impact equipment operations.
qualityOfService.desc2: With dedication, expertise, and smart workflows, clients can be fully confident that every need is prioritized, and service quality is consistently maintained at the highest level.

repairMaintenance.title: Repair & Maintenance
repairMaintenance.intro: Professional repair and maintenance services for <bold>maritime electronic equipment</bold>.

item1.title: Repair Services
item1.desc: With a skilled technical team and thorough preparation—including planning, execution procedures, and spare parts—repair work is carried out on schedule, meeting technical requirements and ensuring high quality standards.
item1.desc1: A ship's officer in today's maritime environment relies on a wide range of <bold>marine electronic equipment</bold> to ensure the safety of the vessel and its crew, while successfully completing missions at sea. Cutting-edge marine electronics has made the journey at sea <bold>smoother and safer</bold>.
item1.desc2: You need the best services to keep your ship’s equipment in optimal working order without negatively impacting your financial bottom line. Wheelhouse is ready to provide <bold>maintenance and repair services</bold> that ensure your equipment operates reliably and efficiently, at the <bold>most cost-effective approach possible</bold>.

item2.title: Maintenance
item2.desc: Shipboard equipment and systems require regular maintenance to extend their lifespan, maintain stability, and ensure safe operation. The equipment that is often serviced on a regular basis includes: Equipment in the GMDSS system; Maritime RADARs; Gyro compass… etc.

item3.title: Remote Support
item3.desc: Our technical support team is always ready to assist you whenever needed. We provide user guidance, scheduled maintenance, as well as prompt consultation and troubleshooting to optimize operational performance.
item3.imgAlt: wheelhouse technician supporting up via internet

repairMaintenance.ctaTitle: Do You Need a Repair, Maintenance or Spare Parts?

installation.title: Installation
installation.intro: Supply and installation the <bold>maritime electronic equipment</bold>.

item1.title: GMDSS, Navigation and Communication
item1.intro: Include full solution from supply, installation, commissioning to maintenance
item1.desc: We provide comprehensive solutions for maritime electronic equipment, covering product consultation, design, supply, installation, and commissioning, ensuring optimal quality and performance. Detailed information on equipment and solutions is available on the Solutions page.

items.title: Navigation & GMDSS Solutions
items.shortDesc: Certified systems for reliable navigation and global distress communication.

items.title: Satellite Connectivity
items.shortDesc: Seamless global connectivity for data, voice and fleet operations.

items.title: Repair & Maintenance
items.shortDesc: Professional repair and maintenance services for maritime equipment.
